tpk::KernelGalacticRefSys

tpk::KernelGalacticRefSys Class Reference

#include <KernelGalacticRefSys.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::KernelGalacticRefSys:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

IAU 1958 Galactic coordinate reference system.

Galactic coordinates are not supported by TCSpk so an ICRefSys object is created by the constructor and each method uses slalib to convert the galactic coordinates to and from ICRS before and after calling the equavalent method of the ICRefSys object.
